this_title: Love in Paradise: The Caribbean, A 90 Day Story Season 2
trans_title: 到美国结婚去：加勒比海岛的爱 第二季
introduction: Surf, sand and seduction collide as couples who met in an island paradise attempt to join their vastly different lifestyles together and transform a flirty fling into a permanent passion.
chinese_title: 到美国结婚去：加勒比海岛的爱 第二季
foreign_title: Love in Paradise: The Caribbean, A 90 Day Story Season 2
